thread.title: Obese woman loses nearly 10st naturally – you won't believe what she looks like now
thread.title_full: Obese woman loses nearly 10st naturally – you won't believe what she looks like now

title: Obese woman loses nearly 10st naturally – you won't believe what she looks like now
text:
Published 24th January 2017 
SLIMMING WORLD BEFORE: Jennifer Ginley said buying size 26 clothes for a trip to Florida was a turning point 
Jennifer Ginley realised it was t ime to change her lifestyle when she went on holiday to Florida just over a year ago. 
The Liverpool native said she had to buy size 26 clothes for the trip and she had to ask for a seatbelt extender on the plane. 
“I spent our time there having to ride on the adjusted seats for larger people and I was horrified when I saw the photos,” Jennifer said. 
“I saw myself in a whole new light – I looked so unhealthy that I cried, wondering how and why I had done that to myself.” The 23 foods that contain NO calories Monday, 16th January 2017 Good news dieters! The 23 foods that contain NO calories – because you burn more than you consume as you eat 1 / 23 Getty Images/EyeEm APRICOTS - Calorie content: 12 kcals per apricotEating apricots is said to help reduce the risk of strokes, and heart attacks. They're also full of vitamin C, potassium and dietary fibre, which all promote good heart health 
The 26-year-old decided then to embark on a weight loss journey that would see her lose an impressive 9st 9lbs from her 19st 4lb frame in just over a year. 
“I’d been a fairly averaged-size child but I was a size 18 by the time I went to university in Manchester. Living away from home saw me gain even more weight and I was around 5st heavier when I graduated,” Jennifer explained. 
“I’d tried so many diets in the past, but all of them seemed to make food the enemy, so I never addressed my relationship with over-eating and nothing seemed to work for me.” 
SLIMMING WORLD AFTER: Jennifer lost an amazing 9st 9lbs without exercising 
Jennifer made the decision to join Slimming World in May 2015 along with her mum and sister. Over the past two years, Jennifer has also gained a 75,000-strong following on Instagram with well-wishers following her weight loss journey. “A really key part of my journey was keeping an online food diary.” Jennifer Ginley 
“A really key part of my journey was keeping an online food diary so that I could chart my progress. From day one I posted my meals on my Instagram account and it really helped me to stay on track,” Jennifer explained. 
“Now I have over 75,000 followers! I still have to pinch myself when people call me an inspiration, or say that they’re going to start slimming because of me.” 
Before losing the weight, Jennifer said she would often discourage her boyfriend of 11 years from proposing because she couldn’t imagine herself as a bride at the size she was. 
“I reached my target weight just over a year after joining Slimming World and just before Christmas Luke asked me to marry him! It was such an incredible feeling to be able to say ‘Yes!’ without even a second thought about my weight, and I can’t wait to go dress shopping.”
